const API_URL=process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL||'https://server-production-aebe.up.railway.app';// Update here if server URL changes
export async function getDomains(token){const res=await fetch("".concat(API_URL,"/api/domains"),{headers:{'Authorization':"Bearer ".concat(token)}});if(!res.ok)throw new Error('Failed to fetch domains');return res.json();}export async function addDomain(domain,token){const res=await fetch("".concat(API_URL,"/api/domains"),{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json','Authorization':"Bearer ".concat(token)},body:JSON.stringify({name:domain})});if(!res.ok)throw new Error('Failed to add domain');return res.json();}
